resources.contents:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  version: 1.0.0
  title: 'some title with eval('
  description: "Acme Bank - Disputes API"
servers:
  - url: http://mockbin.org
    description: mock
  - url: http://acme-dev-gateway.io/8000
    description: DEV API Gateway - mocked 
  - url: http://acme-staging-gateway.io/8000
    description: STAGING API Gateway - integration testing
paths:
  /disputes:
    x-kong-name: disputes
    x-kong-route-defaults:
      strip_path: false
      protocols: [http]
    get:
      operationId: "get-list-dispute"
      description: Return a list of disputes
      responses: 
       '200': 
         description: successful response - return a list of disputes
         content: 
           application/json: 
             schema: 
               type: array
               items: 
                 $ref: '#/components/schemas/Dispute'
       '400': 
          description: Bad request. User Id must ben an integer larger than zero
       '401':
          description: Unauthorized.
       '5XX': 
          description: Unexpected Error. 
  /dispute/{id}:
    get:
      operationId: "get-dispute"
      parameters:
         - in: path
           name: id
           schema:
             type: string
           required: true
      description: Return a list of disputes
      responses: 
       '200': 
         description: successful response - return dispute
         content: 
           application/json:
             schema: 
               $ref: '#/components/schemas/Dispute'
       '400': 
         description: Bad request. User Id must ben an integer larger than zero
       '401':
         description: Unauthorized.
       '5XX': 
         description: Unexpected Error.
components:
  schemas: 
    Dispute:
      type: object 
      properties:
        cardId: 
          type: string
        chargeId: 
          type: string 
        reason: 
          type: string
        id: 
          type: integer
        status: 
          type: string
